about: I am a full stack web developer with one year of experience working on projects for large international companies. I have experience in technologies such as php, laravel, bootstrap etc...
info_about_me: I dedicate my days to the development of new functionalities and resolution of incidents for projects of international companies, carrying out the development in PHP, layout (HTML, CSS) and participating in the Front-end with Angular. I really want to continue training as a programmer. Therefore, I am constantly learning. In addition, I define myself as a very decisive person with a great capacity for teamwork.
higher_degree: Higher degree in web application development
medium_degree: Intermediate degree in microcomputer systems and networks
experience_digital: Development for large companies in a Full-Stack team, including development for a multinational in the pharmaceutical industry.
experience_microdream: Scholarship - Erasmus in the United Kingdom doing hardware support tasks
blade: Responsive Layout (HTML and CSS) with Laravel Blade
git: Using git and GitLab for CI
refact: Refactoring of jQuery code to Angular.
daw_info: You will learn to design, develop and implement web pages using specific technologies, guaranteeing access to data in a secure way and meeting the accessibility, usability and quality criteria required by the established standards.
smr_info: You will learn how to install, configure and maintain microcomputer, isolated or networked systems, as well as local networks in small environments.
auto_app_info: Management and administration project for a driving school, in which students will be able to buy classes, manage them and see their teachers' scores
my_list_info: Game lists project in which I make a rest api to search for games using different filters and organize them into lists
